name: learning-loop
description: Self-improvement workflows for Claude Code - captures session learnings, analyzes patterns, and suggests improvements to CLAUDE.md, agents, and documentation

agents.name: session-analyzer
agents.description: Analyzes completed work sessions for learnings. Use PROACTIVELY after significant work blocks or when user indicates session completion.

agents.name: improvement-suggester
agents.description: Generates concrete improvement suggestions for CLAUDE.md, agents, and documentation. Use after session-analyzer identifies learnings.

commands.name: reflect
commands.description: Run a session retrospective to capture learnings and generate improvement suggestions

commands.name: review-suggestions
commands.description: Review and selectively apply pending improvement suggestions

skills.name: learning-taxonomy
skills.description: Expert knowledge for categorizing and routing learnings to appropriate targets
